WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 27 JUL THRU 04 AUG BY
   M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 9260 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   25-55.75S 040-41.80W, 23-56.32S 042-34.13W.
   23-43.40S 040-42.90W, 22-04.33S 039-37.07W.
   21-58.40S 035-11.75W, 24-10.70S 036-44.62W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2368/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 AUG 18.
